publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5790 Phil Gallie: March for the Union—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers, 12,000 marchers and the many onlookers who participated in the spectacular, well-behaved and good-humoured "march for the Union" in Edinburgh on Saturday 24 March 2007 which was held to commemorate the 300th anniversary of the Act of Union. Supported by: Murdo Fraser*, Mr David Davidson* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-5790 March for the Union (lodged on 27 March 2007) Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Dave Petrie*, Margaret Mitchell*

S2M-5790 Phil Gallie: March for the Union—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers, 12,000 marchers and the many onlookers who participated in the spectacular, well-behaved and good-humoured "march for the Union" in Edinburgh on Saturday 24 March 2007 which was held to commemorate the 300th anniversary of the Act of Union. Supported by: Murdo Fraser, Mr David Davidson, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Dave Petrie, Margaret Mitchell

S2M-5790 Phil Gallie: March for the Union—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers, 12,000 marchers and the many onlookers who participated in the spectacular, well-behaved and good-humoured "march for the Union" in Edinburgh on Saturday 24 March 2007 which was held to commemorate the 300th anniversary of the Act of Union. Supported by: Murdo Fraser, Mr David Davidson, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Dave Petrie, Margaret Mitchell, Mr Brian Monteith*
